titleStmt.title: An Elegy upon the death of Mr. Mason late minister of Water-Stratford, near Buckingham, who departed this life on Monday last, the 12th of this instant May, at his house called the New Noah's Ark, at Water-Stratford.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Printed inside mourning border, with allegorical headpiece.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
